issue.subject: Metadata XML generated from model use name instead of XML isocode in RELATION
issue.description:
In a relation between classes, the XML generated use the *name* of the relation instead of the *XML isocode*.
Haven't seen it before cause all our relations have the name of the nodes...
Renaming a relation makes incoherent model, or crashes form generation!
See screenshots.

details.name: subject
details.old_value: Metadata XML generated from model use name instead of XML fragment in RELATION
